constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 85 (Monday, May 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COSTA:
H.R. 3272.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority under which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to make rules for the government and
regulation of the land and naval forces, as enumerated in
Article I, Section 8, Clause 14 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H2421]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Biodiesel, Renewable Diesel, and Alternative Fuels Extension Act of 2021
